sentences.sContent: Disclosure: This reporter also lives in New Haven and has heard Chua regale friends with parenting stories.
sentences.sContent_eng: Disclosure: This reporter also lives in New Haven and has heard Chua regale friends with parenting stories.
sentences.sCn: 揭秘：记者也住在纽海文，曾经听过蔡在餐桌上分享育儿故事。

sentences.sContent: Here you can still enjoy Chinese and Western buffet in the fresh morning, taste tea in the vernal afternoon and regale special beefsteak in the charming night.
sentences.sContent_eng: Here you can still enjoy Chinese and Western buffet in the fresh morning, taste tea in the vernal afternoon and regale special beefsteak in the charming night.
sentences.sCn: 在这里，您还可以在晨光中享用中西自助餐，在和熙的午后，品尝下午茶，在摇曳烛光中享用特色牛排。

remMethod.val: re(使) + gale(高兴) → 使客人高兴 → 款待
